item.description: If anyone is interested in the lovely, social moment of contra-dance, here's the chance :) Contra-dance is similar to square dance, but more on the folk vein than the country. It's an exhilarating exercise and also an excellent vehicle for meeting others and.. flirtation :) We dance every 1st Saturday October through June from 8-11pm with a lesson starting at 7:30pm. Bring a little something to share during the break if you'd like. This is a beautifully finished floor, clean shoes please. Adults: $10 (members $8) Students: $5 Children under 12: $3 http://quietcornercon... http://www.facebook.c...

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Contra-Dance
